title: Construction or reconstruction of old cessed building falling under reservation/zones contemplated in the DP shall be permitted as specified in Regulation No
clause_text: Construction or reconstruction of old cessed building falling under reservation/zones contemplated in the DP shall be permitted as specified in Regulation No.17(3)(B).
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order

source_pdf.text_snippet: Construction or reconstruction of old cessed building falling under reservation/zones contemplated in the DP shall be permitted as specified in Regulation No.17(3)(B).
